CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Contractor__r.Name ='APPLICANTS',TEXT($User.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c)='English'),'Membership', IF(AND(Contractor__r.Name ='APPLICANTS',TEXT($User.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c)='Quebec French'),'Adhésion', IF(AND(Contractor__r.Name !='APPLICANTS',TEXT($User.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c)='English', TEXT(Payment_Type__c)='Membership Fees'),'Membership', IF(AND(Contractor__r.Name !='APPLICANTS',TEXT($User.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c)='Quebec French', TEXT(Payment_Type__c)='Membership Fees'),'Adhésion', IF(AND(Contractor__r.Name !='APPLICANTS',TEXT($User.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c)='English', TEXT(Payment_Type__c)='Tier Advancement'),'Tier Advancement', IF(AND(Contractor__r.Name !='APPLICANTS',TEXT($User.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c)='Quebec French', TEXT(Payment_Type__c)='Tier Advancement'),'Avancement de niveau','Membership' ))))))
CustomField.label: Invoice Item
